data.actual_result: the menu closes and you can not get to the server invite without hitting done on the top left coroner
data.expected_result: you would be directed to the server invite link, like what happens when you select safari
data.short_description: When opening a invite link on the "open in discord" option when holding down on a server invite link in the in app browser you are not directed to the link, unlike if you chose safari
data.steps_to_repro: - go to user settings, web browser and select in app  - find a web page link in a discord channel that leads to a page that contains server invite link (like the the Reddit page that has the r/DiscordApp server invite) - find the invite and hold down on it - when the option menu appears select "open in discord" - observe what happens
